description: The trail leads from the Parksville Industrial Park to the Englishman River Top Bridge area. A few ups and down but nothing difficult. It starts off in an open area and you gradually proceed into a wooded area and the trail will take you under the railway and highway bridges.
directions: If you're traveling Northward, drive along Industrial way until you pass Tuan Rd on your left and then you'll see a small gravel area on the left for parking. The trail entrance is clearly marked.
title: Top Bridge Trail
